_sText:
IF I HAVE NOT CREDITED YOU FOR A TEXTURE YOU MADE PLEASE TELL ME! I FORGET WHERE I GOT MOST OF THE TEXTURES SO I DON'T KNOW WHO TO CREDIT.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I got this idea from watching my brother play "Nazi Zombie" on COD5. Basically, there are 4 humans and the rest are zombies. The humans need to hold the zombies off for 150 seconds. Once 90 seconds pass, the humans will be allowed to unlock a bomb shelter door from a button that is inside one of the bedrooms. The humans must then fight their way into the bomb shelter (outside) to survive and win the round. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

****CTS****
 - Get to pick a gun from two tables at spawn.
 - Get teled into the 2nd floor of house after 20 seconds.
 - Have 100 HP.

****TS****
 - Get to choose one of three classes
 - Spawn on one of the sides of the house (outside).

**CLASSES**

Skinny zombie
 - 500 HP
 - 1.25 speed
 - Light Green

Normal zombie
 - 1000 HP
 - 1.00 speed
 - Green

Fat zombie
 - 2000 HP
 - 0.75 speed
 - Dark Green

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

****NOTES****
- TS can't pick up guns.
- CTS can only leave a house if a zombie gets in or if the bomb shelter has been unlocked.
-  After 30 seconds, the humans will be allowed to blow up the front door. Blowing up the front door will kill any zombies near it but will make it a lot easier for the zombies to get in and attack you.
- Humans and zombies can break the wood covering the windows. So be careful and dont shoot the wood!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

****PICTURES****
1. The outside of the house.
2. The inside of the bomb shelter.
3. CT spawn
4. T spawn
5. The button to unlock the bomb shelter door.
6. The C4 that will blow up the front.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I don't know how good the gameplay is going to be, so please leave a comment below if one of the teams overpowers another too easily. If there are any glitches or if the gameplay is too bad, I will make a v2 for this map. :)
